channel.title: webdev on Luke Salamone's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in webdev on Luke Salamone's Blog

item.title: Python: Serve an HTML File
item.description: If you want to serve some HTML with python run python -m http.server 8000 Then navigate to http://localhost:8000. This is not meant for production environments but will get you around CORS restrictions that would come from simply opening a local file in your browser.
